glsa.title: GIMP: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: GIMP is vulnerable to a buffer overflow which may lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: GIMP is the GNU Image Manipulation Program.

description.p: Marsu discovered that the "set_color_table()" function in the SUNRAS plugin is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow.

impact.p: An attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted .RAS file, possibly leading to the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running GIMP.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GIMP users should upgrade to the latest version:
